definition: (American football) grasping an opposing player with the intention of stopping by throwing to the ground, seize and throw down an opponent player, who usually carries the ball
details:
noun
- (American football) grasping an opposing player with the intention of stopping by throwing to the ground
- in American football, a position on the line of scrimmage
= example: in American football, a position on the line of scrimmage
= synonyms: guard, end
- gear used in fishing
= synonyms: rig, fishing gear, fishing tackle, fishing rig
- gear consisting of ropes etc. supporting a ship's masts and sails
= synonyms: rigging
- the person who plays that position on a football team
= example: the person who plays that position on a football team
= synonyms: guard
verb
- seize and throw down an opponent player, who usually carries the ball
- put a harness
= synonyms: harness
- accept as a challenge
= example: accept as a challenge
= synonyms: take on, undertake
